"Adding Friend Partners":
"Adding Friend Partners

If you register your current character, the character you add can be summoned by your friends as a friend partner. Each time the character is summoned, you will earn a little FUN. You can customize a variety of settings when adding your character, including combat actions. Try out various settings to see what works best for you.

"

"Also, when adding a free partner, you can extend this request to other players outside of your friends. You will receive a request from the player summoned to add him/her as a Friend.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_preparations_party_partner>"
